entities.name: marietta
entities.description: Marietta is a student who has been affected by a jinx that prevents her from speaking. She is described as having wide and fearful eyes.

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Fudge is the Minister who is impatiently asking Umbridge if there is a counterjinx to free Marietta's speech.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is the person who has been trying to find a counterjinx for Marietta. She admits that she hasn't managed to find one yet.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry feels proud of Hermione's jinxing ability when Umbridge says she can't find a counterjinx.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is the one who has jinxed Marietta, and Harry feels proud of her ability.

entities.name: willy widdershins
entities.description: Willy Widdershins is a student who was in the bar at the Hog's Head when Potter met with other students. He has testified that he heard every word Potter said.

entities.name: potter
entities.description: Potter is the one who met with other students at the Hog's Head in Hogsmeade.

entities.name: mcgonagall
entities.description: McGonagall is a professor who cuts in and asks for evidence of Potter's meeting with other students.

relationships.description: Umbridge is trying to find a counterjinx to free Marietta's speech.
Harry feels proud of Hermione's jinxing ability when Umbridge says she can't find a counterjinx.
Umbridge obtained testimony from Willy Widdershins about Potter's meeting with other students.
